amendment.description: To modify the provisions relating to the staffing and budget of the select Committee.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4036 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4036 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 3981. (consideration: CR S10654; text: CR S10654) To modify the provisions relating to the staffing and budget of the select Committee.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4036 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4036 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 3981.
